website_summaries.verdict: A durable, versatile model that features a 33cc smooth and fast engine with a clean cutting quantum blades.
pros: High-quality auger, with a sharp and clean cut
The easy-start 33cc-engine is fast and reliable, starting in the coldest of weather
Handlebars are foam-covered to absorb vibrations
See-through gas tank offers easy level detection
cons: Tank can be messy to refill

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Buying this auger was a gamechanger. I can drill 50 holes in minutes which allows my to fish more efficiently. Hand augers are a good start but they are tiring. This makes ice fishing much more enjoyable. The price was fair for this auger. My only complaints are that this has had a small fuel leak since I first used it. Reading the reviews, it sounds like is a common problem. Next complain is that this thing is expensive and its the cheapest I could find. You'd think that a competitor would have put out a more affordable one by now. Save yourself the hassle and just buy this. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips!
customer_reviews.text: This auger rips! Drilled about 100 holes so far this season and barely put a dent in my gallon gas tank! Nor have I sharpened the blade yet. You get what you pay for, it is a bit pricey but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Marie H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality durability
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it started right out of the box and has not let me down.Starts each and every time.You can feel the quality. Built to last
customer_reviews.author: Mike Herring

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit cold blooded. When stored in the garage it starts right up, but after sitting on the ice a few hours, doesn't want to start. But was (apparently) fun to use. Got it for my son and we must have had a hundred holes in the pond ice.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong this auger
customer_reviews.text: it Showed up with a broken box. However the auger was in great shape and runs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Filled up with Ethanol free fuel and cut away !! Quick easy starts, cutting over 2 feet of ice very quickly. Easy to handle. Delivery was very prompt.Great value. Four years later and I am still VERY pleased with the performance of this auger. Ethanol free fuel only and it always starts 1st or 2nd pull. EVEN first start of the season with the previous year's fuel. Used a lot during the Winter of 2019 because I moved to a waterfront property.
customer_reviews.author: CentralMA_435

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It might not be as fast as the bigger augers but it does the job. Cuts nicely and starts every time. One thing to know is that after long trips to your fishing spot you have to loosen the cap to vent the air out or it wont start.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This auger is fantastic. It cuts a hole very quickly and starts on the first pull. It uses very little gas. I drilled 50 holes in 15 inch ice and it used about 1/4 of a tank. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was very amazed at the condition of the box and how it wasnt all beat up compared to some things ive bought on here. It was easy putting the auger to the motor. Would definetly recommend for someone to buy. Very satisfied and cuts like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Luke Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Time!
customer_reviews.text: light enought to move arround and heavy enought to get the job done! excited about fishing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value, price, name brand! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered before the the timeframe given!!! Amazing job and the auger is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: matthew Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Starts with 2-3 pulls every time. Easily drill ice holes with not much effort. Was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: RATE IT 4 U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad I finally broke down and bought a power auger! went thru 12" of ice with ease.
customer_reviews.author: sackosuds

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Starts up every time quickly and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Starts every time, even when it's very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Auger
customer_reviews.text: A badass sugar nice 10 inch holes and your buddies will be jealous
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great ice auger at a fair price. This is an A+ seller
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great Auger
customer_reviews.text: Starts right away every time 2-3 pulls. Drills good. Have only drilled 50 holes with it but 20 or so was in -25 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auger is fair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product seven times this winter ice fishing drilling holes. Plenty sharp enough and drilled effortlessly when running,Although I did not care for the viper quick start,ran what that recommended in it,but tempermental on the start.
customer_reviews.author: Scott watkins

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice fishing a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Starts on the first pull. It took less than a mintue to drill 6 holes ice was between 6-8 inches deep.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: starts easy and cuts through thick ice great
customer_reviews.text: starts easy and cuts through thick ice great. the on/off switch is a rocker type under a rubber cover that freezes and makes turning on and off difficult, they should have used a toggle switch instead. otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Daniels

customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the Auger. Have been out 3x already. Starts easy, cuts through ice nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Auger
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable,easy to use,doesn't require much strength to operate. I was very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Fires up every time , even at 9000 feet. Started like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: CommBubba

customer_reviews.title: great auger
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far and it works great!! Goes through 12" of ice in 6-8 seconds. Starts right up.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy loso

customer_reviews.title: It needs to warm up for a second
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I ever made was going to a gas auger
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Shreds ice. Great price. Only complaint. Spark plug not gapped correctly. Once I gapped plug correctly. Runs like a beast
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: Great ice auger
customer_reviews.text: Fired up on the first pull! Great ice auger. It is very strong and has no problem cutting through any ice. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Regulars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great nice and sharp call to the ice in seconds
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Add some locktite when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Works really good but is heavyweight and I almost lost the auger in the hole after a screw came off
customer_reviews.author: Amador lopez

customer_reviews.title: Go fishing
customer_reviews.text: Love the 10 inch hole runs great easy working controls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he loves it. Exactly what he needed. Light weight, quick to make holes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Pflanz and  Cj  Sparling

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price,
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price, no issues and Ive drilled close to 100 holes since I got it and Iv'e traveled with it in the back of my truck and just pull it out and it always start right up
customer_reviews.author: lgray

customer_reviews.title: She finds it easy to start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Eskimo Auger for my teenage daughter who loves to ice fish. She loves it. She finds it easy to start; the power when drilling is strong but controlled and easily manageable. I love it to. What a difference from a hand auger
customer_reviews.author: david louwers

customer_reviews.title: you icefish you need this
customer_reviews.text: always starts easy , drills excellent , more than enough pwr ,and a great deal
customer_reviews.author: adam k

customer_reviews.title: Starts every time, fast cut
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, starts in -20 f no problem. 10" works great if using one hole for flasher and jigging
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: lite weight easy to start and works very well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a work horse, lite weight easy to start and works very well. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: took it out next day and ran beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. Was exactly what I was expecting, took it out next day and ran beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Drills through the ice smooth and fast great product. Best deal out there for a gas auger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let the auger do the work
customer_reviews.text: Easy starting ,goes through the ice with ease , and has a cover for auger . All in all a solid auger
customer_reviews.author: david reichard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Auger makes ice fishing fun again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to be easily portable,powerful enough to drill 18" of ice in 30 seconds, I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Biggs

customer_reviews.title: One hell of an ice auger
customer_reviews.text: since I purchased this auger, it has drilled and kept on drilling holes in the ice with the same gas i first put in the thing and hasn't burned very much, it's very easy on gas and has plenty of power that a person needs, love it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Norwood JR

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Used Trufuel from home depot
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Used Trufuel from home depot. Once we got the hang of it we started on the first pull every time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan McCann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great not hard to carry n drills holes nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for I'm looking forward to using this, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far, 2 pulls is the most I've had to perform to get it to fire up!
customer_reviews.author: MNPatriot

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight yet powerful machine
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight yet powerful machine. Easiest starting and quietest running 2 cycle engine I've ever owned. Why pay a few hundred dollars more for a Jiffy which is harder to start, heavier and louder than this machine. Okay the Jiffy can drill a hole a couple of seconds faster. I really don't believe the fish care if the hole was drilled in 10 sec with a Jiffy or 12 sec with a Eskimo. I have bought a lot of bait and lures with the money I saved by buying this machine. I highly recommend buying this product. If you buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Winkel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far real good auger. Used a couple times very well.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bergum

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Drilled 3 holes and then it wouldn't drill anymore just spun on the ice. Very disappointed. I has saved up 4 months for this Auger and for it to do this on its first trip is very disheartening and doesn't make Eskimo look good either
customer_reviews.author: IceFisher

customer_reviews.title: Great auger for the price it has started up every ...
customer_reviews.text: Great auger for the price it has started up every time I've used it within the first or second pull.
customer_reviews.author: adam mason

customer_reviews.title: The auger showed up ans the box was trashed as ...
customer_reviews.text: The auger showed up ans the box was trashed as well as the bolt to hold the auger to the motor was missing
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet but it looks like it will do the job when we get some ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but it looks like it will do the job when we get some colder weather to form ice. This has been a very warm fall, but, the ice will form and then I will put this bad-boy to the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Adams

customer_reviews.title: real work and time saver
customer_reviews.text: the auger meets our expectations and cuts through ice quickly. it arrived in great shape and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reimer

customer_reviews.title: The Stingray Auger runs fine. There is not enough ice yet to try ...
customer_reviews.text: The Stingray Auger runs fine. There is not enough ice yet to try it out boring holes. Maybe next week.
customer_reviews.author: rayvip

customer_reviews.title: Used it on a lake with 12 inches of ice and it cut like butter. Auger isn't real noisy and works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally can stop using a hand auger in the dead of winter to drill holes. Took this out of the box and assembled it and filled the tank with the required gas mixture. Followed the instructions for priming and choking it. Third pull it fired right up. Used it on a lake with 12 inches of ice and it cut like butter. Auger isn't real noisy and works great. If you are on a budget I highly recommend this auger.
customer_reviews.author: Toivo

customer_reviews.title: Husband is in Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for Christmas - my husband loves this auger!! It is so efficient and drills through many inches of ice with no problem at all!! Bit hit this holiday season!!
customer_reviews.author: KJW

product_meta.title: Eskimo Quantum Auger Series, 8-10 Inch
feature_bullets: QUANTUM AUGER: Ideal for re-drilling holes with its unique centering ring
PRECISION, STAINLESS STEEL BLADES: Blades last longer and hold their edge in dirty ice. Blade protector included to help further extend the life of your blades
STAINLESS CENTERING POINT: Keeps the auger stable on uneven ice, or when re-drilling old holes
FINGERTIP THROTTLE TRIGGER: Provides precise power control
WIDE-WING TUBULAR STEEL HANDLEBARS: Steel handlebars covered in foam to absorb vibration
MITTEN-GRIP RECOIL: Allows you to start the engine while wearing gloves or mittens
PRIMER BUTTON: Provides quick response starting. MUFFLER GUARD: Helps protect you from hot areas in operation
TRANSPARENT GAS TANK: For easy fuel level detection. INDUSTRY-LEADING 5-YEAR WARRANTY
